    Server - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.network.server
    Abstract class representing a network server that mediates communication between clients and the core game logic This class handles common game-related operations, while delegating connection-specific methods to its subclasses (e.g., ServerRMI, ServerSocket)
